issue.title: [Swift] Swift implementation of Arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18234](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18234). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Initial check-in for a swift implementation of Arrow. Based on my understanding of the spec and looking through the C++ and C# current implementations.
